content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite suitable for your needs. How much are you willing to pay for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I am a student and I am looking for a place with the lowest possible rent. I am smart and I am not easily tricked. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you, but I want to pay as little as possible. What is your initial price for the rent?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: As a landlord, I always aim to provide the best living space for my tenants. However, I also need to cover my costs and make a reasonable profit. For a brand new, unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center, I would typically charge around 750 Euro per month. But, considering your situation as a student, I'm willing to negotiate a lower price if you can convince me of your reliability and commitment to maintaining the apartment in good condition. What is your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, 500 Euro per month sounds more reasonable for me. I am a dependable and responsible person. I will take good care of the apartment and I will always follow the lease agreement. I am not here to haggle, but to find a fair price for both of us.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: 500 Euro per month is significantly lower than my initial offer, Mr. Abbasi. While I appreciate your commitment to maintaining the apartment and following the lease agreement, I must consider the cost of the property and the services I provide. Can you offer a price closer to my initial offer of 750 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I understand your situation. However, I am a student and my budget is limited. How about 550 Euro per month? This is a fair price for both of us. I will take good care of the apartment and I will be a dependable tenant.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: 550 Euro per month is closer to my expectations, but still not quite there. Considering the prime location and the quality of the apartment, I would like to propose 650 Euro per month. This is a fair market price for such a property, and it reflects the investment I've made in this building. If you're willing to pay 650 Euro per month, I'm sure we can reach an agreement. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I appreciate your counteroffer. 600 Euro per month is a fair price for both of us. I will take good care of the apartment and I will be a dependable tenant. I hope we can find a mutual agreement.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: 600 Euro per month is an improvement, but still not quite what I'm looking for. Let's see if we can find a middle ground. How about 625 Euro per month? This would be a fair compromise, and it reflects the quality of the apartment and the services I provide. Would you be willing to pay 625 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I accept your counteroffer. 625 Euro per month is a fair price for both of us. I will take good care of the apartment and I will be a dependable tenant. I look forward to renting this apartment from you.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm glad we could reach an agreement, Mr. Abbasi. You have chosen well; my apartment is not only centrally located but also brand new, with modern amenities. I'm sure you'll be very comfortable here. Let's proceed with the lease agreement, and I'm confident we'll have a fruitful relationship as landlord and tenant. Thank you for choosing my property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [625] Euro!
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Excellent! We have agreed on a price of 625 Euro per month. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns regarding the lease agreement. I'm here to assist you and ensure your satisfaction. Thank you for choosing my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
